title: Bhagavad Gita in Curriculum: Reviving Ancient Wisdom
description: Union Minister H D Kumaraswamy has pledged to engage Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan in discussions regarding the inclusion of the Bhagavad Gita in educational curricula across schools colleges and universities

title: Lara Williams: There’s already a deal to beat dirty fossil fuels
description: A United Nations climate summit has once again failed to strengthen a pledge made two years ago to transition “away from fossil fuels.”

title: Life and death in ancient Southampton - as told by the town's shocking records
description: The sleepy seaside settlement was ridden, again and again, by the most notorious killer of the middle ages.
